app.description: Connect to an external URL to fetch busy events data for calendar integration.

url.label: URL
url.tooltip: The URL endpoint that provides busy events data. Start and end times will be passed as query parameters in ISO format.

headers.label: Headers
headers.tooltip: Optional HTTP headers to include with requests

url.max: URL must be at most 2048 characters long

key.max: Header name must be at most 256 characters long

value.max: Header value must be at most 4096 characters long

statusText.successfully_connected: Successfully connected to URL busy events provider
statusText.error_fetching_busy_times: Error fetching busy times from URL
